name: Plate Armor
description: Heavy armor that provides excellent protection but is cumbersome.

name: Chainmail
description: A medium armor made of interlocking metal rings, offering a balance of protection and mobility

effects.name: Last Stand
effects.description: When below 25% HP, it enchances the wearer's armor class.

name: Brigandine Armor
description: A medium armor made of a fabric base with metal plates riveted to it, providing good protection and flexibility.

name: Leather Armor
description: Light armor made from hardened leather, offering basic protection and mobility.

name: Steel Shield
description: A sturdy shield made of steel, providing additional protection.

name: Wooden Shield
description: A lightweight shield made of wood, offering basic protection.

name: Iron buckler
description: A small, round shield made of iron, easy to carry and quick to use.

name: Defense Style
description: A combat style that focuses on enhancing your armor class through defensive techniques.
